Package com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.util.gui

Class GridBagPanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.util.gui.GridBagPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GridBagPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
GridBagPanel is a convenient way of using gridbaglayout as the layout of the JPanel. Basically, this class make a JPanel and set the gridbaglayout on it and take Constraints from the user at the time of initialization or mutually with the help of object.

This will help to reduce the length and complexity of the code, while making a layout with many no. of components on it. Hence, This class makes the gridBagLayout more powerful in the java.

Author:
Mohit Saini
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GridBagPanel

      public GridBagPanel()
      Creates a new GridBagPanel with zero insets, fill both, anchor center, ipadx zero and ipady is also zero

    • GridBagPanel

      public GridBagPanel​(java.awt.Insets insets)
      Creates a new GridBagPanel with fill both, anchor center, ipadx zero and ipady zero
      Parameters:
      insets - the Insets among grids of the layout

    • GridBagPanel

      public GridBagPanel​(java.awt.Insets insets, int fill, int anchor)
      Creates a new GridBagPanel with ipadx zero and ipady also zero
      Parameters:
      insets - the Insets among grids of the layout
      fill - the stretching behavior of the component inside the grid
      anchor - the position of the component inside the grid

    • GridBagPanel

      public GridBagPanel​(java.awt.Insets insets, int fill, int anchor, int ipadx, int ipady)
      Creates a new GridBagPanel with the help of parameters
      Parameters:
      insets - the Insets among grids of the layout
      fill - the stretching behavior of the component inside the grid
      anchor - the position of the component inside the grid
      ipadx - the padding X-axis of the grid to set component
      ipady - the padding Y-axis of the grid to set component

  • Method Details

    • setInsets

      public void setInsets​(int top, int left, int bottom, int right)
      This method is use to set the Insets of the grid in the layout
      Parameters:
      top - the top side gap
      left - the left side gap
      bottom - the bottom side gap
      right - the right side gap

    • setFill

      public void setFill​(int fill)
      This method is use to set the fill behavior of the component inside the grid
      Parameters:
      fill - the stretching side

    • setAnchor

      public void setAnchor​(int anchor)
      This method is use to set the anchor for the component in the grid
      Parameters:
      anchor - the position of the component

    • setIPadding

      public void setIPadding​(int ipadx, int ipady)
      This method is use to set the internal padding of the grid
      Parameters:
      ipadx - the internal padding along X-axis
      ipady - the internal padding along Y-axis

    • setGridDimension

      public void setGridDimension​(int width, int height)
      This method is use to set the dimension of the grid
      Parameters:
      width - the width of grid
      height - the height of grid

    • setGridWeight

      public void setGridWeight​(double weightx, double weighty)
      This method is use to set the weight of the grid
      Parameters:
      weightx - the weight of grid along X-axis
      weighty - the weight of grid along Y-axis

    • add

      public java.awt.Component add​(java.awt.Component comp, int gridx, int gridy)
      This method is use to add Component on the GridBagPanel with the help of grid dimension
      Parameters:
      comp - the component we need to add
      gridx - same as the GridBagConstraints.gridx
      gridy - same as the GridBagConstraints.gridy
      Returns:
      the same component as in parameter

    • add

      public java.awt.Component add​(java.awt.Component comp, int gridx, int gridy, int gridwidth, int gridheight)
      This method is use to add component on the GridBagPanel with the help of constraints
      Parameters:
      comp - the component we need to add
      gridx - same as the GridBagConstraints.gridx
      gridy - same as the GridBagConstraints.gridy
      gridwidth - same as the GridBagConstraints.gridwidth
      gridheight - same as the GridBagConstraints.gridheight
      Returns:
      the same component as in parameter

    • add

      public java.awt.Component add​(java.awt.Component comp, int gridx, int gridy, int gridwidth, int gridheight, double weightx, double weighty)
      This method is use to add component on the GridBagPanel with the help of constraints, as parameterized
      Parameters:
      comp - the component we need to add
      gridx - same as the GridBagConstraints.gridx
      gridy - same as the GridBagConstraints.gridy

      gridheight - same as the GridBagConstraints.gridheight
      weightx - same as the GridBagConstraints.weightx
      weighty - same as the GridBagConstraints.weighty

      the same component as in parameter
